SEARCH
Package ba.unsa.etf.rpr.business

Class PassengersManager

java.lang.Object
ba.unsa.etf.rpr.business.PassengersManager
public class PassengersManager extends Object
The PassengersManager class provides functionality for managing passengers. It has functions for validating passengers information, adding new passengers, updating existing passengers, deleting passengers and getting all passengers or passenger by id. It uses DaoFactory class to interact with data storage.

  • Method Details

    • validatePassengerName

      public void validatePassengerName(String name) throws FlightBookingException
      Validates passenger's name. If the name is null or length is not between 3 and 20 characters long, throws FlightBookingException with message "Passenger name must be between 3 and 20 characters long".
      Parameters:
      name - String name of the passenger to be validated.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingException - if the name is null or length is not between 3 and 20 characters long.

    • validatePassengerSurname

      public void validatePassengerSurname(String surname) throws FlightBookingException
      Validates passenger's surname. If the surname is null or length is not between 3 and 20 characters long, throws FlightBookingException with message "Passenger surname must be between 3 and 20 characters long".
      Parameters:
      surname - String surname of the passenger to be validated.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingException - if the surname is null or length is not between 3 and 20 characters long.

    • validatePassengerAddress

      public void validatePassengerAddress(String address) throws FlightBookingException
      Validates passenger's address. If the address is null or length is not between 3 and 20 characters long, throws FlightBookingException with message "Passenger address must be between 3 and 20 characters long".
      Parameters:
      address - String address of the passenger to be validated.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingException - if the address is null or length is not between 3 and 20 characters long.

    • add

      public Passengers add(Passengers passengers) throws FlightBookingException
      Adds new passenger to the data storage. If the passenger's id is not 0, throws FlightBookingException with message "Can't add passenger with ID. ID is autogenerated".
      Parameters:
      passengers - Passengers object representing the passenger to be added.
      Returns:
      Passengers object representing the newly added passenger.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingException - if the passenger's id is not 0.

    • delete

      public void delete(int passengerId) throws FlightBookingException
      Deletes the passenger with given id from the data storage. If the passenger with given id has tickets, shows an error alert with message "You have to delete tickets of this passenger !".
      Parameters:
      passengerId - Integer id of the passenger to be deleted.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingException - if there is some other error during deletion.

    • update

      public Passengers update(Passengers passengers) throws FlightBookingException
      Method update updates a record of passengers in the database.
      Parameters:
      passengers - an instance of Passengers
      Returns:
      an instance of Passengers updated successfully.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingException - when an error occurs during the update operation.

    • getAll

      public List<Passengers> getAll() throws FlightBookingException
      Method getAll retrieves all records of passengers from the database.
      Returns:
      a List of all passengers records.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingException - when an error occurs during the retrieval operation.

    • getById

      public Passengers getById(int id) throws FlightBookingException
      Method getById retrieves a record of passengers with a specific ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the passenger.
      Returns:
      an instance of Passengers with the specific ID.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingException - when an error occurs during the retrieval operation.
